title: Draft kickoff questions + seed queries
acceptance: DECISIONS含C0问题块；queries.md 含非空关键词

title: Write review protocol (search/inclusion/exclusion)
acceptance: 包含数据库/检索式/时间窗/纳入排除/提取字段

title: Human approve protocol
acceptance: 勾选 DECISIONS.md 的 Approve C1（并记录 protocol）

title: Run screening and produce screening log
acceptance: title/abstract筛选完成且有决策与理由

title: Extract full-text data into table
acceptance: 纳入论文100%完成字段提取

title: Assess bias/risk-of-bias fields in extraction table
acceptance: 偏倚字段存在并对每篇纳入论文填写 low/unclear/high + notes

title: Synthesize evidence (PROSE allowed)
acceptance: 每主张有证据链；局限性与偏倚明确
